hero.title: Build multilingual apps faster.
hero.subtitle: This starter demonstrates how to structure language routes using the App Router and how Lingo.dev can help generate translations for UI content.
card1.title: Language Routing
card1.desc: Pages are available under /en, /hi, /es and more.
card2.title: Lingo.dev Compiler
card2.desc: Add Lingo.dev compiler to build pipeline for translation workflows.
card3.title: Community Ready
card3.desc: Minimal, easy setup + clean README for community submissions.
about.title: About
about.desc: This project demonstrates language routing in Next.js and automatic translation using Lingo.dev.
pricing.title: Pricing
